snippet: With the legendary coach Pat Summitt dealing with early onset dementia, Tennessee has to face its usual expectations as well as the question of whether this will be Summitt’s last season.
abstract: Tennessee women's basketball team and coach Pat Summit are preparing to open the NCAA women's basketball tournament against Tennessee-Martin; as a perennial women's basketball powerhouse, Tennessee has to face its usual expectations as well as the question of whether this will be the last season for Summit, who is dealing with early onset dementia.
lead_paragraph: With the legendary coach Pat Summitt dealing with early onset dementia, Tennessee has to face its usual expectations as well as the question of whether this will be Summitt’s last season.

headline.seo: Pat Summitt’s Health Gives Tournament Different Feel for Lady Vols
headline.main: The Usual High Expectations Mingle With Uncertainty
headline.print_headline: Usual High Expectations Mingle With Uncertainty for Lady Vols
